description: Defines the Polymer IronMenuBehavior, implementing accessible menu behavior with properties, event handlers, and methods for menu item focus, selection, and keyboard navigation.

methods.name: select
methods.description: Selects a menu item by value, toggling if multi-select is enabled.

methods.name: _resetTabindices
methods.description: Resets tabindex attributes on menu items based on current selection.

methods.name: _focusWithKeyboardEvent
methods.description: Focuses an item based on keyboard input.

methods.name: _applySelection
methods.description: Updates ARIA-selected attribute based on selection state.

methods.name: _focusedItemChanged
methods.description: Updates tabindex and focus when the focused item changes.

methods.name: _onIronItemsChanged
methods.description: Handles mutations in the list of menu items.

methods.name: _onShiftTabDown
methods.description: Handles shift+tab key event for focus management.

methods.name: _onFocus
methods.description: Handles focus event on the menu.

methods.name: _onUpKey
methods.description: Handles up arrow key to move focus.

methods.name: _onDownKey
methods.description: Handles down arrow key to move focus.

methods.name: _onEscKey
methods.description: Handles escape key to blur focus.

methods.name: _onKeydown
methods.description: Handles general keydown events for navigation.
